text:
[thread] Thank you to Matt Hancock & all those working under him

On ramping up

On straining every sinew

To increase the coronavirus / day testing of the UK

You didn't meet the target

And all you had to do is be honest in that

But you weren't 

The why & how infuriate me

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
